 Vi söker dig som vill arbeta i ett företag med energi, erfarna kollegor och en attraktiv ersättningsmodell. Om du, liksom vi, värnar om en arbetsmiljö där nyfikenhet, prestigelös kunskapsdelning och energi frodas så är detta en unik chans för dig att vara med och bidra till vår starka kultur. Hos oss får du även möjlighet att växa i din yrkesroll och vara med och forma morgondagens digitala lösningar för våra kunder.
   

  

**Om rollen** 
**:**
 Som konsult hos oss kommer du att arbeta i intressanta uppdrag hos Sveriges största och mest innovativa banker och försäkringsbolag för att hjälpa dem i deras digitaliseringsresor. Du kommer att ansvara för den tekniska leveransen och verka i en agil miljö tillsammans med ditt team. Uppdragen kan innebära allt från att utveckla en ny mobilbank eller ett nytt sätt att betala till att vidareutveckla komplexa lösningar för att lagra känsliga finansiella data eller bedöma kreditvärdighet. Att du har ett inre driv och på ett prestigelöst sätt kan leda och samarbeta med ditt team tror vi är avgörande för att du ska lyckas i ditt uppdrag hos kunden.
   

  

**Ett CV säger inte allt, men vi ser att:**
* Du har arbetat i en teknisk ledarroll i minst 2 år. T.ex som Tech lead eller Scrum Master.
* Du har goda kunskaper inom agila ramverk som t.ex Scrum, SAFe, Kanban etc.
* Du har minst 5 års erfarenhet som utvecklare.
* Du behärskar svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.
* Det är meriterande om du har jobbat som konsult tidigare och har erfarenhet av bank och försäkringsbranschen.


**Vi erbjuder:**
* Attraktiv lönemodell.
* Friskvårdsbidrag och tjänstepension.
* Goda förutsättningar för flexibla arbetstider
* Möjligheter att gå relevanta utbildningar och ta attraktiva certifikat.
* En fantastisk wellness- och medarbetarsatsning. Läs mer här


**Vilka vi är:**
 B3 Financial Consulting är en del av B3 Consulting Group, ett av Sveriges snabbast växande företag inom IT och management. Således kan vi erbjuda det bästa av två världar. Styrkan hos ett stort börsnoterat bolag i kombination med den härliga samhörigheten som ett mindre bolag erbjuder. Vi är även stolta över att vi vann priset som ”Årets Karriärföretag 2022", vilket vi även är nominerade till i år, och kom på tredje plats som Sveriges bästa bolag enligt ”Great Place to Work 2021”. Vi tror att det beror på vår energi, vårt sätt att välkomna olikheter och våra erfarenheter som vi gärna delar med oss av. En central del av energiskapandet är vår unika wellness-satsning Team B3. Vi tror att medarbetare som mår bra, presterar bra och vill vara engagerade kollegor och goda medmänniskor.
   

  

 De som jobbar kvar hos oss efter många år pratar om friheten att påverka sina uppdrag, arbetstider och utveckling. De talar även om stoltheten över att vara en del av ett bolag som inte bara levererar förstklassigt resultat till sina kunder utan även tar ansvar för samhället i stort bl.a. genom att vara partner till fina initiativ som Women in Tech, Changers Hub, Pink Programming m.fl.
   

  

**Låter det som något för dig?**
 Vi vill fortsätta att växa, så ansök till oss idag och följ med på vår resa! Vi kommer att intervjua kandidater löpande och ber dig därför att skicka in din ansökan redan idag.
   

  

 Läs mer om B3 Financial Consulting
 **här** 
**.**
 Klicka på ansökan och tveka inte att kontakta Ann-Charlotte Olsson på telefonnummer: +4673-261 02 36 eller email:
 **ann-charlotte.olsson@b3.se** 
 eller Talent Acquisition Parner Marcus Krebs på
 **marcus.krebs@b3.se**

title: Junior Accountant
description:
*Volumental is the footwear industry's leading FitTech™ company, using 3D scans and a one-of-a-kind, AI-powered recommendations engine (with 50 million foot scans) to match everyone with the footwear styles and sizes that fit them best whether you are shopping in-store or online.*
*Our vision is “a world without sizes, where every body fits”. With top brand and retail partners worldwide, including New Balance, Red Wing Shoes, The Athlete's Foot, Ecco, Fleet Feet, Intersport, Sun & Sand Sports, and XXL, our footprint spans 3000+ stores across 53 countries, and growing!*
**And that's where you come in!** 
 With our team headquartered in Stockholm and currently composed of 60+ people, we are looking for a
 **Junior Accountant** 
 to join us, with a primary focus on accounts payable and assisting with accounts receivable.
   

  

**What will you do?**
* Own Accounts Payable: Manage end-to-end AP process, including invoice registration, coding, approvals, and vendor payments. Handle reminders and ad-hoc AP tasks.
* Accounts Receivable: Assist with posting incoming payments, issuing invoices, managing customer inquiries, performing aging analysis, and following up on collections.
* General Ledger Entries: Record daily and monthly journal entries, conduct bank reconciliations, and manage capitalization, depreciation, and currency exchange rate entries.
* Balance Sheet Reconciliation: Conduct monthly balance account reconciliations to ensure financial accuracy.
* Asset Management: Maintain and update the Asset Register for proper capitalization and depreciation.
* Expense Management: Handle Pleo administrative tasks and export data for expense reporting.
* Compliance & Tax Filings: Assist in reporting VAT and EU Sales Tax , support in reconciling the tax account, and help ensure accurate tax postings.


****We are excited about you because…****
* You have at least 1 year of experience in accounting, with a focus on AP and AR.
* You are organized, detail-oriented, and can manage multiple tasks simultaneously.
* You are proactive, eager to learn, and enjoy solving problems.
* You communicate effectively and thrive in a collaborative environment.
* You are open to learning new systems and tools.
* You are fluent in English. With colleagues from over 20 countries and customers worldwide, it's truly an international environment! Swedish is considered a plus.


**Bonus!**
**Don't let these stop you from applying, but please let us know if they fit you:**
* You have experience working with VAT taxes.
* You are familiar with Fortnox accounting software.
* You have experience with Ordway.
* You are proficient in Excel.
* You have experience with month-end procedures.
* You have worked in a SaaS company before.
* You have interest and/or experience in the tech industry.


 You'll be an essential part of the greater whole — able to drive initiatives and steer development while at the same time collaborating with other subject matter experts on our team.
 **We encourage a diversity of candidates to apply!**

title: ICSR Manager
description:
**Who we are** 
  
   

 We’re here to connect you to what matters most, and by doing so, empowering societies. As a Telenor employee, you will be part of a large organization that goes beyond customers – we want to play a meaningful role in the societies we serve. Being connected can change your life, and we’re serious about helping our services make the widest possible impact.  
   

  

 We are looking for a person with a big interest in project management and internal control to join our Finance Center of Excellence in the role as ICSR Manager.
   

  

**What is Sustainability at Telenor?** 
  
   

  

 Telenor is engaged in playing a key role in the sustainability challenge that lays ahead of us all. Today, Telenor have a structured sustainability work. Now it is time to take the next step on this sustainability journey, do you want to join? 
   

  

**What you’ll do** 
  
   

 As a ICSR (Internal Control over Sustainability Reporting) Manager you will be a key team player in Finance Center of Excellence (CoE) team. You will act as a project manager and setting up the control environment for our sustainability reporting to make sure we have an ICSR Framework in place by 2027.
   

  

 You will: 
   

  

* Implement ICSR within our organization, including stakeholder management
* Support the organization with advice on setting up controls to cover the risks within the sustainability area
* Identify future legislation changes that will impact the way we work
* Drive ICSR communication activities internally and externally
* Represent Telenor Sweden in Telenor Nordics and Group ICSR networks
* Contribute to the Finance Center of Excellence team common work and projects


 You will be part of the CoE team, that today consists of in total six experts within ICFR (Internal Control over Financial Reporting), Risk Management, Accounting, TAX, Treasury and Insurances. The team advise the company on subject issues and lead projects within their specific area. You will report to the Head of Finance Center of Excellence. 
   

  

**Who are you** 
  
   

 To succeed in this role, you demonstrate the ability to work independently and in a “can do” attitude. You have the ability to work with details as well as seeing the bigger picture. You work in close collaboration with stakeholders, both internally and externally which put high expectations on your collaboration and project management skills. You have previous experience as a project manager and understand the importance of internal control. You are solution oriented, efficient, structured, dedicated and not afraid to take ownership of tasks and responsibilities. 
   

  

 To succeed in this role you shall have: 
   

  

* A degree at Bachelor level (or higher) on business administration, management or equal
* Relevant work experience
* Experience from internal control
* Strong integrity
* Written and verbal communication skills in Swedish and English


 The following is a merit: 
   

  

* Proven track record of manager/leadership roles or experience as an auditor
* Interest in, and experience from, the sustainability area


**Come join the team** 
  
   

  

 If you would like to know more, please contact Hiring Manager Ann Zackrisson, ann.zackrisson@telenor.se , Head of Finance Center of Excellence. Please apply by following the “apply” link in the ad. We do not evaluate CVs sent directly to us on email. 
   

  

  
   

**Good to know** 
  
   

  

 Application deadline: We evaluate candidates continuously so please apply today 
   

 Time: Full time position 
   

 Location: Stockholm 
   

  

 According to Telenor's policy, we conduct background checks on the final candidate for all recruitments.

title: Business Analyst inom försäkring
description:
Beskrivning av tjänsten
   

  

 På CGI ligger vi i framkant när det kommer till digitalisering och tillämpning av nya teknologier. Just nu söker vi medarbetare som delar vår passion och som har en erfarenhet inom affärsutveckling.
   

  

 Vi söker en engagerad och erfaren Business Analyst med teknisk bakgrund inom Försäkring som kommer att fortsätta leda framgångsrika projekt för våra kunder, samtidigt som du stärker vårt team med dina erfarenheter och insikter.
   

  

 Dina framtida arbetsuppgifter
   

  

 I rollen som Business Analyst kommer du att ha en central roll i att stödja och utveckla våra IT-projekt och verksamhetsprojekt inom försäkringsbranschen. Din roll kommer att vara starkt kundinriktad, där du analyserar affärsbehov och formar skräddarsydda lösningar för att uppfylla deras krav.
   

  

 Kvalifikationer för att bli framgångsrik denna roll
   

  

 Du är en initiativtagande person som trivs i en snabbväxande miljö. Som en del av vårt team förväntas du vara självgående men samtidigt en lagspelare. Du har utmärkta kommunikationsfärdigheter och en naturlig fallenhet för problemlösning.
   

  

 Vi tror att du har en bakgrund inom datavetenskap, systemvetenskap eller liknande och har mellan 3-5 års erfarenhet inom försäkringsbranschen. Vidare har du god kännedom kring regelverken som styr försäkringsbolagens verksamhet (tex DORA, FIDA). Du har arbetat med databaser eller ETL-processer och är väl bevandrad inom SAFe.
   

  

**Det är extra meriterande om du har kunskap eller erfarenhet av följande teknologier**
* Generative AI /automation
* AI/RPA
* DataManagement / strategy
* Core insurance lösningar som tex Lumera, Sapiens Guidewire


 Om du söker dig till en arbetsplats som utmanar, utvecklar och hjälper dig vidare i din professionella karriär så är CGI rätt plats för dig. Ansök nu för att utforska möjligheten att vara en del av vårt spännande team inom Försäkringar!
   

  

 Har du frågor om tjänsten är du välkommen att höra av dig till rekryterande chef Susann Edvardsson på Susann.Edvardsson@cgi.com
   

  

**Låt oss som ägare omvandla verklig insikt till handling – tillsammans.**
 Livet på CGI bygger på ägande, lagarbete, respekt och tillhörighet. Tillsammans med oss kommer du att kunna nå din fulla potential.
   

  

 Du är inbjuden att ta ägandeskap redan från första dagen i vårt arbete med att förverkliga vår dröm om att skapa en arbetsmiljö där vi trivs med att arbeta tillsammans och bidrar till framgången för vårt företag. Det är därför vi kallar oss CGI Partners snarare än anställda. Vi drar nytta av vår kollektiva framgång och tillsammans får vi möjlighet att aktivt forma vår företagsstrategi och inriktning.
   

  

 Ditt arbete skapar värde. Du kommer att vara med att utveckla innovativa lösningar och bygga relationer med medarbetare och kunder samtidigt som du får tillgång till globala möjligheter att skala upp dina idéer, omfamna nya möjligheter och dra nytta av gedigen bransch- och teknikexpertis.
   

  

 Du kommer att forma din karriär tillsammans med ett företag som är byggt för att växa och bestå. Du får stöd av ledare som bryr sig om din hälsa och ditt välbefinnande och ger dig möjligheter att fördjupa dina kunskaper och vidga dina vyer.
   

  

 Bli en del en av världens största leverantörer av IT- och affärskonsulttjänster.

title: Engineering Manager
description:
Our vision is to transform presentations, meetings and lectures by turning passive audiences into engaged contributors. We make this possible through our interactive presentation platform where the traditional presentation monologue becomes an inclusive dialogue. We believe in the power of together and that the most successful leaders listen to be heard.
   

  

 With Mentimeter, users become the best presenter they can be. Meetings become more productive, participants learn more and have fun whilst doing it.
   

  

 We have more than 300 million users and customers worldwide, on our way of making the world a better place, one presentation at a time.
   

  

 Mentimeter’s vision is to transform presentations and meetings into collaborative and interactive experiences by making it easy to listen and to be heard. We believe in giving everyone a voice in every meeting and presentation. We are building a modern, friendly, and diverse product-first tech company based in Stockholm, and we want you to join us!
   

  

**The role**
 As an
 **Engineering Manager** 
 , you will be responsible for tech, delivery, strategy, and people.
   

  

 In this role you will ensure the team delivers exceptional results, balancing tech, product and delivery. You'll be pivotal in guiding sound decision-making and fostering a productive environment. You will be part of the Product Department which is responsible for developing our product to best fulfill the needs of our users.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Be a strong voice for tech in the team and advocate for good practices aligned with our tech strategy.
* Be the line manager of engineers in the team, oversee their well-being and professional development, and actively coach and inspire them to reach their full potential.
* Foster great collaboration in the team through leading, planning and facilitation.
* Engage in strategic decision-making, collaborating across departments and teams to amplify the impact of the product.


**Skills And Requirements**
 As you will be managing software engineers, you must have hands-on experience in technical discussions and environments that allows you to comfortably facilitate architectural and sound technical decisions.
   

  

 You are accountable for delivery in the team and to efficiently do that we expect you to have a mindset of constantly pushing boundaries, both engineering and process wise. You also have experience of guiding teams through planning and delivery of modern features.
   

  

 As a line manager for software engineers, you need to enjoy coaching and mentoring people to growing and also be comfortable having difficult conversations. As you also are responsible for the staffing of the team, you should be able to have the understanding of the requirements to execute on your long term plan.
   

  

 Mentimeter is a fast-moving product-led growth company. Therefore you must desire to work in a fast-paced environment where change a constant.
   

  

****So, who are you?****
* 3+ years of experience as a team lead or managing engineers in a cross-functional agile team
* Several years of work in technical environments, where you were responsible to ask (or answer) technical questions and reason about them. You might have had roles like software or quality engineer, technical PM/PO, etc.
* Strong communication, storytelling, and facilitation skills, fostering unity and inspiring teams.
* Eagerness to contribute to a fast-growing organization and adaptability to different contexts.


**What Mentimeter Can Offer**
 At Mentimeter we can offer a diverse and inclusive work environment supported by smart and driven colleagues. We believe in continuous professional development for all of our colleagues and therefore offer access to a leadership program (including external personal coach) and relevant education to ensure that we continue to be state-of-the-art when it comes to innovating and building Mentimeter. Your place will be in a growing company with lots of career opportunities, working on a beloved product used by more than 300 million people. It’s not all about work though, we also offer a very healthy view on work-life balance.
   

  

 All of this comes attached with a competitive compensation and benefits package, including pension contributions. Once a year we also relocate to exciting places all over the world like Merida & Buenos Aires for our Toronto colleagues, cities in Europe (for our Stockholm colleagues), and cities in APAC (for our Sydney colleagues), paid for by us of course. Learn more about our benefits by visiting our Benefits & Perks page
   

  

**Culture at Mentimeter**
 At Mentimeter we believe in giving everyone a voice - regardless of who you are. So we build a platform that does just that. Our platform is not only our product but also our organization. A platform where people feel safe, where differences are embraced, a place where you can have fun. We strongly encourage applicants who are people of color, LGBTQ+, women, people with disabilities, and/or formerly incarcerated people, and a college degree is not strictly required. In order to give everyone a voice, we need to be as diverse as our users.
   

  

 Learn more about our culture by visiting our Culture page .
   

  

 Review our Privacy Policy for more information.

title: Enterprise Account Executive, IgniteTech (Remote) - $100,000/year USD
description:
Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, IgniteTech. Have you got what it takes?
   

  

 The sales industry is drowning in inefficiency, yet ripe for disruption. At IgniteTech, we're not just tweaking systems; we're overhauling the sales process with advanced AI tools that change the game. Our AI-enhanced execution and predictive forecasting are not just about improvement but transformation, boosting sales efficiency and effectiveness dramatically.
   

  

 In this role, you'll wield cutting-edge generative AI to not only enhance real-time sales executions but also steer long-term market forecasting. Imagine deploying AI that provides instant, deep insights during live customer interactions, or forecasting models that predict market shifts with stunning accuracy. Here, your work will directly increase sales conversions and ensure that our forecasts hit the mark, recalibrating in real time as the market evolves.
   

  

 You will also integrate into a team where your efforts reshape our overarching business landscape. Your day-to-day will involve leveraging AI to streamline current sales processes and articulating complex AI benefits to non-technical stakeholders. This position is crafted for someone who thrives under pressure, loves a challenge, and is eager to push boundaries in AI and sales.
   

  

 If the prospect of leading such transformative initiatives excites you, IgniteTech is your stage. This is where you can make a significant impact, leading the charge in AI-driven sales innovation. Ready to lead the future of B2B sales with groundbreaking AI? Apply now and join us in setting new industry standards at IgniteTech.
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
* AI-Enhanced Sales Execution: Direct application of GenAI technologies to facilitate and enhance the day-to-day execution of sales activities.
* Advanced Sales Forecasting and Market Analysis: Oversee advanced analytics projects that use AI to forecast long-term market trends and sales performance.
* Drive AI Adoption: Lead initiatives to deploy AI-driven tools that assist sales teams in real-time during customer interactions and sales negotiations.


**Enterprise Account Executive Key Responsibilities**
* Drive significant improvements in sales efficiency and effectiveness through the development and implementation of AI-driven sales tools.


**Basic Requirements**
* Professional experience leveraging multiple LLMs (ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, etc.) and AI tools to automate manual tasks and boost your company's productivity (if you've only ever used ChatGPT, that's probably not enough)
* At least 3 years of experience in B2B software sales


**About IgniteTech**
 If you want to work hard at a company where you can grow and be a part of a dynamic team, join IgniteTech!
   

  

 Through our portfolio of leading enterprise software solutions, we ignite business performance for thousands of customers globally. We’re doing it in an entirely remote workplace that is focused on building teams of top talent and operating in a model that provides challenging opportunities and personal flexibility.
   

  

 A career with IgniteTech is challenging and fast-paced. We are always looking for energetic and enthusiastic employees to join our world-class team.
   

  

 We offer opportunities for personal contribution and promote career development. IgniteTech is an Affirmative Action, Equal Opportunity Employer that values the strength that diversity brings to the workplace.
   

  

 There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!
   

  

**Working with Crossover**
 This is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover. The compensation level for this role is $50 USD/hour, which equates to $100,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.
   

  

**What to expect next:**
* You will receive an email with a link to start your self-paced, online job application.
* Our hiring platform will guide you through a series of online “screening” assessments to check for basic job fit, job-related skills, and finally a few real-world job-specific assignments.


**Important!** 
 If you do not receive an email from us:
   

  

* First, emails may take up to 15 minutes to send, refresh and check again.
* Second, check your spam and junk folders for an email from Crossover.com, mark as “Not Spam” since you will receive other emails as well.
* Third, we will send to whatever email account you indicated on the Apply form - by default, that is the email address you use as your LinkedIn username and it might be different than the one you have already checked.
* If all else fails, just reset your password by visiting https://www.crossover.com/auth/password-recovery if you already applied using LinkedIn EasyApply.


 Crossover Job Code: LJ-5266-SE-Stockhol-EnterpriseAcco

title: Lead Architect
description:
Nu har du möjlighet att axla rollen som Lead Architect och göra avtryck i utvecklingen av framtidens betalinfrastruktur.
   

  

 Bankgirots uppdrag är både att säkerställa dagens system och tjänster och att modernisera den nuvarande betalinfrastrukturen och skapa lösningar för framtiden. Bankgirot har tagit de första stegen och arbetet framåt sker så snabbt som möjligt i en löpande dialog med banker, myndigheter och andra intressenter.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Som Lead Architect kommer du vara del av ett team med arkitekter och ansvariga för den dagliga verksamheten och IT-leveransen på Bankgirot.
   

  

 Du kommer att ansvara för den arkitekturella styrningen i det operativa arbetet och att projekt och initiativ följer arkitekturella principer och riktlinjer samt att alla avsteg och övriga arkitekturella vägval dokumenteras i enlighet med gällande instruktioner.
   

  

 Du kommer leda arbetet med framtagande av arkitekturella beskrivningar och lösningsbeskrivningar för beslut i SAGB (Security and Architecture Governance Board). Du kommer leda och ansvara för Bankgirots arkitekturella samverkan med leverantörer samt vara delaktig i arkitekturella beslutsforum.
   

  

**Är det här du?**
* Du har förståelse för förmåga, process-, begrepps- och informationsmodellering samt kravhantering.
* Har övergripande kunskap om affärsmodelldesign, målmodellering och tjänstedesign.
* Har övergripande kunskap om IT-förmågor och nuvarande IT-landskap, dess komplexitet samt vilka möjligheter och begränsningar detta skapar i olika scenarier.
* Erfarenhet av modelleringsverktyg som SPARX Enterprise Architect eller andra verktyg.
* Kännedom om de regler som gäller för den tillståndspliktiga verksamhet som Bankgirot bedriver.
* Erfarenhet av att leda workshops med både verksamhets- och IT-experter som deltagare.
* Relevant eftergymnasial utbildning och flerårig erfarenhet av rollen Lead Architect eller en likande roll.


 Vi kommer lägga stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper i rekryteringen. Vi söker dig som är analytisk, förändringsbenägen och duktig på att presentera och kommunicera information, både internt och externt, på olika nivåer.
   

  

**Övrigt**
 Denna anställning hos Bankgirot omfattas av säkerhetsprövning som kommer att genomföras i samband med anställning, i enlighet med säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585).
   

  

**Intresserad av att ansöka eller få veta mer?**
 I den här rekrytering samarbetar Bankgirot med IDG Recruitment. Vill du veta mer om tjänsten eller har frågor kring rollen är du varmt välkommen att kontakta Fredrik Svensson, Rekryteringskonsult, på 0760 22 82 56, fredrik.svensson@foundryco.com
   

  

 Bankgirot är ett svenskt clearinghus som säkerställer betalningar mellan privatpersoner, företag och organisationer. Varje dag strömmar drygt nio miljoner betalningar till ett värde av 84 miljarder kronor genom Bankgirots betalningssystem.
   

  

 Sedan drygt 60 år är Bankgirot en viktig del i kedjan för betalningar. Med tillstånd från Finansinspektionen fortsätter Bankgirot att utveckla och leverera framtidssäkrade tjänster som möjliggör utvecklingen av svensk betalmarknad.
   

  

 Hos oss får du som medarbetare ett stort ansvar och en stor roll oavsett vad du jobbar med.

title: SAP Master Data Governance Project Manager
description:
**Hiring\_ SAP Master Data Governance Project Manager** 




  





 Location: Stockholm, Sweden
 



 Job type: Contract
 



  





**Job Description:** 




  





**﻿
 
 SAP Master Data Governance (MDG) Project Manager :-** 




  
 



 •             Configure, design, build, test, and deploy the core SAP MDG solution, ensuring seamless functionality
 



 •             Collaborate with project teams, team leaders, delivery leads, and client stakeholders to create standout Accenture Master Data Governance offerings and SAP Digital Core
 



 •             Facilitate resolution of data management and data quality issues related to conflicting data ownership, data and rule definition, data availability, and data usage
 




  
 



 •             Design and optimize end-to-end SAP Core Master Data Governance processes for clients.
 



 •             Conduct workshops to drive key design decisions using best practices.
 



 •             Configure, design, build, test, and deploy the core SAP MDG solution
 



  
 



**Details about the project they would be working on - (If there is differentiator in terms of superior technology versions/exposure/other benefits please specify. It will help generate more interest and boost applications ) :-** 




  
 



 To pursue the implementation of S/4Hana as Industrial ERP Backbone (IEB) which will serve as a base for the Industrial processes and IT landscape to drive harmonization and standardization of processes and technology. Started to build a Master Data Strategy and Approach that shall align with Scania’s vision and objectives for a future industrial ERP backbone, to simplify and deliver on business-critical priorities, improve reliability of operations, improve agility relating to growth, and build a foundation that can support long-term growth and new business model

title: Citrixtekniker
description:
Motiveras du av it-utmaningar där du får möjlighet att utforska olika tekniska miljöer och hitta de bästa lösningarna? Vill du vara en viktig del i Säkerhetspolisens arbete och bidra med din goda tekniska kunskap?
 



 Nu söker vi Citrixtekniker som tillsammans med engagerade kollegor arbetar för Sveriges säkerhet. Vårt uppdrag är Sveriges säkerhet.
 



  





 Ort: Stockholm
 



 Sista ansökningsdag: 2024-08-25
 



  





  





**Det här är ditt uppdrag** 




 Som citrixtekniker ingår du i ett team med engagerade och kompetenta kollegor. Tillsammans ansvarar ni för förvaltning och utveckling av Säkerhetspolisens Citrix-miljöer med den omgivande Microsoft-miljön.
 



  





 Du arbetar i framkanten med komplexa it-miljöer där det ställs höga krav på it- och informationssäkerhet. Dina arbetsuppgifter kan innefatta bland annat design, installation och uppgradering samt konfiguration. I din roll ingår även felsökning och att stötta teamet med din kunskap för att kunna analysera och åtgärda komplexa problem.
 



  





 Parallellt med att ta hand om den befintliga miljön arbetar du även aktivt med att hitta nya tekniska lösningar, både på egen hand och tillsammans med andra. Du har ett högt lösningsorienterat fokus och inspireras av automatiserade smarta lösningar. Detta för att säkerställa hög drift samt effektivisering av våra miljöer genom olika tekniker, exempelvis molnbaserade plattformar eller scripting.
 



  





 Då vår miljö ständigt utvecklas och förändras har vi hela tiden fokus på automatisering, där scriptning är ett viktigt verktyg. En självklar del av arbetet är också att skapa och upprätthålla tydlig dokumentation.
 



  





 Du håller dig uppdaterad inom ditt område och bevakar den senaste utvecklingen inom it- och informationssäkerhet.
 



 Din placering är på huvudkontoret i Solna.
 



  





**De här kvalifikationerna söker vi hos dig** 




  





 Vi söker dig som har:
 


* Fullgjord gymnasieutbildning med godkända betyg
* Minst två års arbetslivserfarenhet med Citrix-plattformar
* Minst två års arbetslivserfarenhet med Windows infrastruktur
* Erfarenhet av installation och förvaltning av Citrix-plattformar
* Erfarenhet från arbete i enterprise-miljöer
* God förmåga att kommunicera på svenska i tal och skrift
* God läsförståelse i engelska



  





 Du som söker kan också ha kompetens som tillför bredd och kompletterande perspektiv. Kan du bidra med något eller flera av följande är det meriterande:
 


* Kunskap kring informations- och it-säkerhet
* Erfarenhet av arbete med molnbaserade automatiserade lösningar



  





**Det här är kollegan vi söker** 




 Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper och söker dig som tycker om att självständigt driva ditt arbete framåt och samtidigt ha en aktiv och hjälpsam roll i ditt team. Du bidrar till gott arbetsklimat där delaktighet och engagemang värdesätts.
 



  





 Du ställs gärna inför komplexa utmaningar inom ditt uppdrag där du får möjlighet att utforska olika förslag och lösningar. I rollen som citrixtekniker är du nödvändigtvis inte knuten till ett förutbestämt teknikval, så din goda förmåga att tänka fritt och ditt fokus på lösningar kommer här väl till hands.
 



  





 Med din goda tekniska kunskap har du förmågan och modet att ständigt tänka nytt, utforska olika förslag och hitta lösningar, men även utmana existerande design med förbättringar. Tillsammans med ditt team arbetar ni leveransfokuserat i en agil miljö och driver ert arbete mot goda resultat.
 



 Som person är du prestigelös med förmåga att se din del i helheten och hur du kan bidra till verksamheten. Omvärldsbevakning och att vara uppdaterad med det senaste inom tekniken är en självklarhet för dig.
 



  





 Säkerhetspolisen ställer höga krav på säkerhet- och sekretess, därför förutsätter vi att du har ett högt säkerhetsmedvetande.
 



  





**Anställningsvillkor** 




 Svenskt medborgarskap är ett krav, då anställning vid Säkerhetspolisen innebär placering i säkerhetsklass. För anställning krävs också godkänt resultat i säkerhetsprövningen med registerkontroll, som genomförs i enlighet med säkerhetsskyddslagen.
 



 Det här är en tillsvidareanställning som inleds med sex månaders provanställning. Vi tillämpar individuell lönesättning. Med anställning följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras.
 



 På vår hemsida, www.sakerhetspolisen.se, kan du läsa mer om hur det är att arbeta hos oss samt om våra förmåner.
 



  





**Så tar du kontakt med oss** 




 Du är välkommen att ringa rekryterande chef, tfn 010-568 82 63. För information om rekryteringsprocessen, kontakta HR-enheten, tfn 010-568 70 06.
 



 Fackliga företrädare: Polisförbundet, tfn 010-568 70 03, SACO, tfn 010-568 70 04 och ST, tfn 010-568 70 02.
 



  





**Så ansöker du** 




 Ansökan sker via vår hemsida, www.sakerhetspolisen.se
 



 Ansökan ska ha kommit in senast
 **2024-08-25** 
 .
 



  





 I ditt personliga brev och CV vill vi att du beskriver på vilket sätt du uppfyller våra efterfrågade krav och eventuella meriter. Beskriv också hur dina personliga egenskaper bidrar i rollen.
 



  





 Urval och intervjuer kan ske löpande.

title: Cloud Solution Architect: Security (Defender, Entra, XDR, etc.)
description:
With over 17,000 employees worldwide, the mission of the Customer Experience & Success (CE&S) organization is to empower customers to accelerate business value through differentiated customer experiences that leverage Microsoft’s products and services, ignited by our people and culture. Come join CE&S and help us build a future where customers achieve their business outcomes faster with technology that does more.
   

  

 We are looking for a Cloud Solution Architect (CSA), specializing in Security who is passionate about driving our customers’ security & AI transformation on the Microsoft Platform. This is a customer-facing role, owning the technical relationship between the customer and Microsoft, helping customers to leverage their Microsoft investments through architecture, implementation, and operational health engagements.
   

  

 Microsoft’s mission is to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. As employees we come together with a growth mindset, innovate to empower others, and collaborate to realize our shared goals. Each day we build on our values of respect, integrity, and accountability to create a culture of inclusion where everyone can thrive at work and beyond.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* You will drive positive Customer Satisfaction and become a trusted advisor and provide feedback and insights from customers/partners and be the Voice of Customer to share insights and best practices, connect with Global Security teams at Microsoft, Engineering and Product teams to remove blockers and influence the solution roadmap.
* You will land an end-to-end value prop for Security (i.e., Zero Trust) which spans the breadth of Microsoft Security offerings, and with focus on Threat Protection, ID + Access Management and Cloud Security.
* You will support customers through the adoption lifecycle, through planning, adoption, deployment and optimization as you support increasing drive of Microsoft security products utilization as you lead technical solutioning and nurturing across the customer journey.
* You will deliver technical presentations & demos and propose high-level solutions and work with key Microsoft and Partner resources to drive deployment & customer adoption Identify cross sell/upsell/Unified opportunities through customer engagement.
* You will align your individual skilling to team/area demands and Customer Success goals and accelerate customer outcomes - Share expertise, contribute to IP creation & re-use to accelerate customer outcomes.
* Run Architectural Design Session to build a plan for implementing the solution – governing design in line with customer business goals and their technical environment. Outcome is consensus on solution design and next steps toward production.
* Collaborate and orchestrate with other Cloud Solution Architects and MS stakeholders including FastTrack, partner, and Microsoft Consulting in developing complex end-to-end Enterprise solutions with the Microsoft Security platform.


**Qualifications**
* Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Engineering, Business, or related field AND expert level experience in cloud/infrastructure technologies, information technology (IT) consulting/support, systems administration, network operations, software development/support, technology solutions, practice development, architecture, and/or consulting
+ OR Master's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Engineering, Business, or related field AND significant experience in cloud/infrastructure technologies, technology solutions, practice development, architecture, and/or consulting
+ OR equivalent experience

* Significant experience working in a customer-facing role (e.g., internal and/or external)
* Significant experience working on technical projects
* Technical Certification in Cloud (e.g., Azure, Amazon Web Services, Google, security certifications)
+ Threat protection, SIEM and Incident Response; Extended Detection and Response (XDR); Security Orchestration, Automation, and Response (SOAR); Security Operation Center Management; Identity and Access Management; Cloud Infrastructure; Cloud Security; Data Security; Certification in one or more of the following technologies preferred: Microsoft 365 Security Administrator, Microsoft Security Operations, Cloud Security, CCSP, CEH, OSCP, GSEC.


 Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. Consistent with applicable law, all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, citizenship, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, immigration status, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran or military status, race, ethnicity, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable local laws, regulations and ordinances. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application process, read more about requesting accommodations.

title: IAM Consultant
description:
**B3 Secure söker engagerade IAM-experter som vill vara med och bygga Sveriges ledande konsultbolag inom informations- och cybersäkerhet.**
 B3 Consulting Group växter starkt inom området säkerhet och det vill vi fortsätta att göra framöver. Därför gör vi en storsatsning på säkerhet och har startat upp B3 Secure. Ett bolag som har ambitionen att bli Sveriges ledande konsultbolag inom informations- och cybersäkerhet - för våra medarbetare och kunder. Vi söker därför etablerade IAM-experter som vill bli nyckelspelare inom ett område som konstant växer och som vill vara med och utveckla B3s säkerhetserbjudande till nya nivåer.
   

  

**Om rollen:**
 Som konsult hos oss ges du möjligheter till intressanta uppdrag hos en mängd olika spännande kunder. Att du har förmågan att skapa relationer och på ett prestigelöst sätt samarbeta i team tror vi är avgörande för att du ska lyckas i ditt uppdrag. I uppdragen arbetar du nära kunden för att själv eller tillsammans med andra kartlägga, analysera och omvandla krav och behov till förstklassiga IAM-lösningar. Du ger konsultativa rådgivning och arbetar praktiskt med allt som rör design, lösningar och implementation av allt från autentisering till monitorering. Uppdragen kan även innebära att du är ansvarig för att utveckla befintliga IAM-lösningar. Som vi alla är väl medvetna om så växer området så att det knakar och därför kan rollen innebära att du även kommer att vara drivande i utbildningar kopplat till området samt i arbetet med att ta fram policyer och riktlinjer.
   

  

**Vi ser att du har följande kvalifikationer:**
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet från IAM-området.
* Erfarenhet av IT-infrastruktur och IAM-funktioner i molnet (Azure AD, AWS IAM, GC IAM eller OCI IAM).
* Du arbetar obehindrat på svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift.
* Det är meriterande om du har arbetat som konsult.


**Vi erbjuder:**
* Attraktiv lönemodell.
* Friskvårdsbidrag och tjänstepension.
* Goda förutsättningar för flexibla arbetstider
* Möjligheter att gå relevanta utbildningar och ta attraktiva certifikat.
* En fantastisk wellness-satning.


 B3 Secure är en del av B3 Consulting Group, ett av Sveriges snabbast växande företag inom IT och management. Således kan vi erbjuda det bästa av två världar. Styrkan hos ett stort börsnoterat bolag i kombination med den härliga samhörigheten som ett mindre bolag erbjuder.
   

  

 Vi är även stolta över att vi vann priset som ”Årets Karriärföretag” 2022 och kom på tredje plats som Sveriges bästa bolag enligt ”Great Place to Work 2021”. Vi tror att det beror på vår energi, vårt sätt att välkomna olikheter och våra erfarenheter som vi gärna delar med oss av. En central del av energiskapandet är vår unika wellness-satsning Team B3. Vi tror att medarbetare som mår bra, presterar bra och vill vara engagerade kollegor och goda medmänniskor. Det är även viktigt för oss att ge dig möjligheter till att löpande utbilda och certifiera dig inom relevanta områden för att du ska känna att du utvecklas och ökar ditt marknadsvärde.
   

  

 De som jobbar kvar hos oss efter många år pratar om friheten att påverka sina uppdrag, arbetstider och utveckling. De talar även om stoltheten över att vara en del av ett bolag som inte bara levererar förstklassigt resultat till sina kunder utan även tar ansvar för samhället i stort bl.a. genom att vara partner till fina initiativ som Women in Tech, Changers Hub, Pink Programming m.fl.
   

  

**Kontakt:**
 Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig så ansök redan idag.
   

  

 Vi tar inte emot ansökningar via mail, men har du någon fråga är du mer än välkommen att höra av dig till Talent Acquisition Partner marcus.krebs@b3.se

title: Customer Success Partner
description:
*Maersk is a global leader in integrated logistics and have been industry pioneers for over a century. Through innovation and transformation we are redefining the boundaries of possibility, continuously setting new standards for efficiency, sustainability, and excellence.*
*At Maersk, we believe in the power of diversity, collaboration, and continuous learning and we work hard to ensure that the people in our organization reflect and understand the customers we exist to serve. With over 100,000 employees across 130 countries, we work together to shape the future of global trade and logistics.*
*Join us as we harness cutting-edge technologies and unlock opportunities on a global scale. Together, let's sail towards a brighter, more sustainable future with Maersk.*
**We are currently looking for a Customer Success Partner.**
 As a
 **Customer Success Partner** 
 having a Sales oriented mindset with excellent Account management skills you will work alongside the Client Manager as a co-pilot. You will be responsible for assisting in the selling of the Maersk Line portfolio to customers, working closely with a Client Manager to deliver sales budgets, targets and KPIs for defined customer accounts. You will be working cross functionally to bring synergy and to collaborate with internal teams to streamline processes leading to improved customer experience.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
* Through effective relationship building and developing a good understanding of your customers, you will be selling our products, handling renewals, conducting regular reviews and effectively managing the accounts to contribute to the overall volume and revenue targets for the business
* Ensuring that rate negotiations are completed and processed in a timely manner according to customer requirements and Maersk pricing guidelines, in order to secure maximum business, revenue, and profit for Maersk. Whilst delivering the best service to the customer
* Communicating quickly and efficiently with our Clients, you will be a key contact for them within the sales team. You will be responsible for solving problems for our clients, including handling invoice queries and identifying solutions to prevent errors impacting collections
* By using our Customer Relationship Management tools (Salesforce.com and others) you will be recording important client information around business opportunities and market feedback, therefore a high attention to detail is required
* Working cross functionally and managing some ad hoc admin tasks, you will be responsible for delivering the best possible customer experience and playing an important role in the end to end shipment process for the customer


**Required Experience & Skills:**
* With experience of working with customers, you will ideally have proven success in a similar role. Shipping and Logistics experience is not essential but an added advantage
* Some Sales experience will be good
* High-level product understanding including how it solves different customer pains
* Strategic influencing – stakeholder management and influencing
* Negotiation skills


**Personal Characteristics**
* Sales oriented mindset with excellent Account management skills
* Customer Centricity
* Multitask in a constantly changing environment, you will be able to work under time restrictions with a sense of urgency to deliver to a high standard
* Anticipating and problem solving, you will have high levels of accuracy and the ability to maintain data.
* Resolving problems with effective solutions, you will be able to eliminate roadblocks and maintain focus.
* As a collaborative, customer-focused individual, you will continuously strive to achieve results and deliver and excellent customer experience.
* With the ability to listen, understand and influence, you will be someone who can build appropriate rapport.
* As an excellent communicator, you will have the ability to build trusted relationships both within Maersk Line and the customer’s organization.
* You will thrive in an environment of many different stakeholders and enjoy working across boundaries and with other teams to ensure that sales strategy is achieved.


 We look forward to your application!
   

  

 Maersk is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace, and we embrace different styles of thinking. Maersk is an equal opportunities employer and welcomes applicants without regard to race, colour, gender, sex, age, religion, creed, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, marital status, sexual orientation, physical or mental disability, medical condition, pregnancy or parental leave, veteran status, gender identity, genetic information, or any other characteristic protected by applicable law. We will consider qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with all legal requirements.
   

  

 We are happy to support your need for any adjustments during the application and hiring process. If you need special assistance or an accommodation to use our website, apply for a position, or to perform a job, please contact us by emailing accommodationrequests@maersk.com.

title: Implementation Consultant
description:
**ADP are hiring for a Implemenation Consultant to join our growing Implemenation team!**
**If you have experience in onboarding clients/project management and preferably implementing Hogia please keep reading!**
**LOCATION:** 
**Östermalmstorg 1, 114 42 Stockholm, Sweden**
**Hybrid working – 3 days in office and 2 days from home**
**Job Purpose**
 Working directly with the client to set expectations on go live date and getting ready for implementation of Hogia. Gatekeeper for system set-up and keeping the client warm until resource is assigned.
   

  

**Responsibilites**
* Works directly with clients remotely to agree delivery of contractual elements
* Work across projects of all levels of complexity including bespoke requirements
* Gate keeper of setting up systems
* Ensure all relevant reports are received from the client and validated before the project is assigned resource
* Works closely with the Allocation and Resourcing team to ensure effective use of resource
* Exercise judgement and provide guidance based on previous experience, practices, and precedents
* Acts as an interface with other departments
* Raising and handling escalation when required
* Address conflicts or problem situations as soon as possible by working directly with those involved
* Communicate to the wider teams consistently on updates for projects
* Contribute and participate in knowledge sharing and team development sessions
* Develop processes and procedures to meet the needs of the client and business


**Requirements**
* A structured approach to managing workload and managing client expectations
* Networking skills making you a key point of contact for business users
* Ability to manage stakeholders and foster partnerships both internally and externally at different levels of the organisation
* Ability to maintain focus and work effectively to tight deadlines and multiple priorities
* Ability to manage 3rd party suppliers, driving them to deliver whilst maintaining a good relationships
* Analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to deal with numerous tasks simultaneously and with frequently changing priorities
* Excellent oral and written communication skills, particularly in completing relevant documentation
* Qualified vocational training/SALK/Further education or equivalent
* Good knowledge of pre-systems and Hogia salary plus/Flex HRM
* Project management
* Experience from other service profession/consultative work
* Microsoft 365, good skills in Excel
* Structured with good documentation habits
* Genuine interest in problem solving
* High integrity
* Taking responsibility, educational
* Proficient in speaking and writing Business English
* Proficient in speaking and writing Swedish
* GDPR


**Benefits**
* Pension scheme
* Hybrid working
* Internal training - access to a variety of internal courses and programs to upskill and provide CPD
* 30 days holiday
* Employee Assistance Program


**You'll Love Working Here Because You Can**
* Be yourself in a culture that values equity, inclusion, and belonging and creates a safe space for diverse perspectives and insights.
* Belong by joining one of ten Business Resource Groups where you can connect globally with networks and allies who share common interests and experiences.
* Grow your career in an agile, dynamic environment with plenty of opportunities to progress.
* Continuously learn through ongoing training, development, and mentorship opportunities.
* Be your healthiest. Best-in-class benefits start on Day 1 because healthy associates are happy ones.
* Focus on your mental health and well-being. We're here to provide exceptional service to our clients, and none of that happens without each of us taking care of ourselves and being there for one another.
* Join a company committed to giving back and generating a lasting, positive impactupon the communities in which we work and live.
* Get paid to pay it forward. Company-paid time off for volunteering for causes you care about.


**Diversity, Equity, Inclusion & Equal Employment Opportunity at ADP:** 
 ADP is committed to an inclusive, diverse and equitable workplace, and is further committed to providing equal employment opportunities regardless of any protected characteristic including: race, color, genetic information, creed, national origin, religion, sex, affectional or sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, lawful alien status, ancestry, age, marital status, protected veteran status or disability. Hiring decisions are based upon ADP’s operating needs, and applicant merit including, but not limited to, qualifications, experience, ability, availability, cooperation, and job performance.
   

  

**Ethics at ADP:** 
 ADP has a long, proud history of conducting business with the highest ethical standards and full compliance with all applicable laws. We also expect our people to uphold our values with the highest level of integrity and behave in a manner that fosters an honest and respectful workplace. Click https://jobs.adp.com/life-at-adp/ to learn more about ADP’s culture and our full set of values.

title: Manager Tech Domain
description:
**About Us**
 Everyone working at Scania is united by a common purpose: Driving the shift towards a sustainable transport system. We know that the transport industry must change, and it’s a change we want to lead. Scania’s continuous transformative work within circularity, electrification and autonomy shows commercial ideas, powerful insights and competencies that make real change happen.
   

  

 Ventures and New Business at Scania have a key role in driving the shift and contributing to this vision. We develop and deliver new businesses, supporting Scania’s long-term growth and profitability ambitions. At Ventures and New Business, we develop complementing solutions to our core and build new growth through ventures and investments that strengthen and support our acceleration, driving the shift. We want to engage and inspire our entire organization to create results together with us, and collaboration and entrepreneurial spirit are part of our culture and what makes us successful.
   

  

**Job Description**
 In the role as Manager Tech Domain you are responsible to secure the ”feasibility lens” for all our ventures and you are the expert within the technical domain.
   

  

 Your responsibility is to ensure the technical view (hardware and software) of the venture's solutions, coach the ventures and lead the team within the area and have the internal and external network.
   

  

 You will lead a team with competences within hardware development, software development and data analysis and make sure that each venture have the resources within the area to work with the topics regarding feasibility.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
 In the role of Technical Lead your main key tasks will be:
   

  

* Support the ventures with execution on ideas that the Venture & New Business Management Team have prioritized and decided
* Build high achieving team within the domain, allocate critical resources to support venture growth
* Line manager for a team existing of competences within hardware development, software development and data analysis
* Recruit the right competence for the ventures
* Secure the way of working within the domain and make sure our processes and templates always is up to date according to standards
* Secure “Venture Build Framework” for the feasibility lens
* Coach our ventures within topics of your domain
* Continues improvement within our ventures within the domain
* Be the internal spokesperson from Venture Operation regarding hardware and software development
* Secure internal and external network within the domain
* Work closely with V&NB organization to share strategy insights, best practices, setbacks and learnings within the domain
* Part of the Venture Operation Management Team


**About You**
 We seek someone with deep technology experience who can determine if we can and how to build either hardware or software solution for our customers based on their needs. The role involves acting as an internal consultant and being an expert in the technical domain. Therefore, it is crucial that you are a positive influence and a good collaborator as you will interact with a wide array of internal and external stakeholders. Good communication skills are key since you will be interacting closely with business executives both across the company and externally. You are a goal-oriented doer and a team player that loves to see people and ventures grow and succeed!
   

  

**We Also Believe That You (requirements)**
* Have leadership skills and have a proven record of building high performance teams
* Have extensive domain experience
* Have a deep technical experience with a commercial approach
* 10+ years in product development and technology leadership, preferably in a startup or entrepreneurial environment, with a proven track record of success.
* Strong strategic thinking and demonstrated ability to translate business objectives into technology strategies and execution plans.
* Excellent technical understanding of both front-end and back-end development, system architecture, IoT, AI and machine learning.
* Proven experience in driving digital product innovation and delivering exceptional user experiences.
* Entrepreneurial mindset with a passion for driving technological advancements, evaluate risks make decisions to achieve business growth.
* Deep understanding of architecture qualities such as: security, scalability, resiliency and availability in high performance low latency systems
* You preferably have experience in transport and logistics and have been working with innovative and sustainable business models.
* Master’s degree or equivalent, probably in Engineering or data science.


**What We Offer**
 We offer you the chance to be part of an organisation that is focused on reaching Scania’s targets and truly driving the shift to a sustainable transport system. With the opportunities of the current transformative changes within the transport industry, we are on a very exciting journey. This is the right time to join us!
   

  

**Information and application**
 Please apply via our supplier: https://www.headagent.se/lediga-jobb/4465-manager-technical-domain/
   

  

 We are working with an ongoing selection; please apply as soon as possible if you are interested, but no later than 2024-08-31.
   

  

 Kindly note that a background check might be conducted for this position.
   

  

 Scania is one of Sweden's largest companies and offers trucks and buses for heavy transport in combination with a wide range of product-related services. Our mission is to drive the transition to a sustainable transport system by developing safe, smart and energy-efficient transport solutions that are better for both people and our planet. Today, Scania have around 50,000 employees in around 100 countries. For more information visit Scania.com

title: Operativ driftansvarig IT till Svensk Direktreklam
description:
Vill du jobba i en operativ roll där du får arbeta med modernisering, utveckling och förändring i en organisation som är ute på en spännande förändringsresa? Vi söker en erfaren och engagerad individ som vill vara med och driva förändringar samt säkerställa en stabil och effektiv IT-miljö. Välkommen in med din ansökan!
 



  

**Företag :**
 SDR Svensk Direktreklam
 



  

**Plats :**
 Uppsala, Stockholm
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 IT
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Enligt överenskommelse
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Rekrytering
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Som Operativ driftansvarig IT kommer du arbeta mångfacetterat med både operativa och administrativa uppgifter.
   

 Genom att leda, planera och genomföra förändringar inom IT-landskapet kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i att modernisera och anpassa Svensk Direktreklams IT-miljö till de krav som ställs, i nära samarbete med IT-tekniker. Du kommer också att fungera som den primära kontaktpersonen för externa leverantörer och delta i upphandlingar samt omförhandlingar av avtal. Du kommer ha ett nära samarbete med ledningsgruppen och företagets danska IT-organisation. Du kommer också vara arbetsledare till en IT-tekniker där ni tillsammans säkerställer en fungerande IT-miljö inom Svensk Direktreklam .
 


  


 Placering: HK i Uppsala alternativt kontoret i Stockholm Liljeholmen.
 


  


  

**Du erbjuds**



  

  
* Möjlighet att växa och utvecklas inom en framgångsrik och växande koncern
  
* Möjlighet till hybridarbete
  
* Goda anställningsvillkor och förmåner
  

  


**Arbetsuppgifter**
  
* Ansvara och delta operativt i drift, underhåll och utveckling av företagets IT-infrastruktur
  
* Samla in verksamhetens behov på IT miljön
  
* Ansvara för inköp och IT-budget
  
* Vara kontaktyta för alla externa leverantörer samt IT hos organisationens danska ägare
  
* Leda, planera och resursplanera utifrån behov och prioritet
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**
  
* Har tidigare erfarenhet från en liknande roll inom IT och tidigare arbete i en driftsorganisation
  
* Har erfarenhet av arbete i en MIcrosoft baserad miljö, systemhantering, infrastruktur och molntjänster
  
* Besitter en bred teknisk kompetens och förstår vikten av att hålla en IT-miljö stabil och uppdaterad
  
* Har tidigare erfarenhet av leverantörsstyrning och kan planera och genomföra förändringar med skicklighet och effektivitet
  
* Är flytande i svenska både i tal och skrift, samt goda kunskaper i engelska
  


  


 I den här rekryteringsprocessen kommer vi lägga stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper där vi ser att du är prestigelös, förändringsbenägen och ansvarstagande. Du trivs i en kombinerad roll där du både är operativ och ansvarig för att driva frågor och presentera lösningar i forum tillsammans med ledningsgrupp. Därmed besitter du även en stark kommunikationsförmåga. Vidare ser vi att du är en strukturerad person med passion för teknik och förbättringsarbete.
 


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Denna rekryteringsprocess hanteras av Academic Work och Svensk Direktreklams önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten skickas till Academic Work.
 


  


 Rekryteringsprocessen ser ut såhär:
 


  

  
* Telefonintervju med Academic Work
  
* Urvalstest - personlighet & kognitiv förmåga
  
* Djupintervju med Academic Work
  
* Intervju med Svensk Direktreklam
  
* Referenstagning + beslut
  


  


 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och annonsen kan därmed komma att tas ned om det är så att vi har gått vidare till urvals- och intervjufas.
   




**SDR Svensk Direktreklam**

 Svensk Direktreklam är Sveriges största privata direktreklamföretag och sysselsätter närmare 400 anställda på 34 franchiseföretag. 5000 deltidsanställda utdelare gör företaget till en av Sveriges största ungdomsarbetsgivare. Företaget har 45 års erfarenhet av direktreklam och distribuerar årligen över en miljard trycksaker till Sveriges konsumenter.
 


  


 Svensk Direktreklam arbetar i hela värdekedjan kring direktreklam: från kampanjmål, målgruppsurval, idé, utformning, tryck och distribution av reklamtrycksaker till uppföljning och mätning av reklamens effekter. Svensk Direktreklam har ambitiösa miljö och hållbarhetsmål och har bedrivit ett gediget miljöarbete sedan år 2000 och är ISO 14001 certifierade.
 


  


 Du kan läsa mer om företaget här!
   




**Bli direktrekryterad till SDR Svensk Direktreklam**

 Detta är en direktrekrytering, vilket betyder att den kandidat som får tjänsten blir direktanställd av kundföretaget. Rekryteringsprocessen hanteras av Academic Work.
   




**Har du frågor om tjänsten?**

 Anna Skogum eller någon av kollegorna i rekryteringsteamet svarar dig gärna på upp01@academicwork.se Ange annons-ID i ditt mail: 15106220

title: Custom Engineer
description:
SS&C is a global provider of investment and financial services and software for the financial services and healthcare industries. Named to Fortune 1000 list as top U.S. company based on revenue, SS&C is headquartered in Windsor, Connecticut and has 20,000+ employees in over 90 offices in 35 countries. Some 18,000 financial services and healthcare organizations, from the world's largest institutions to local firms, manage and account for their investments using SS&C's products and services.
   

  

****Job Description****
 SS&C is a global provider of investment and financial services and software for the financial services and healthcare industries. Named to Fortune 1000 list as top U.S. company based on revenue, SS&C is headquartered in Windsor, Connecticut and has 20,000+ employees in over 90 offices in 35 countries. Some 18,000 financial services and healthcare organizations, from the world's largest institutions to local firms, manage and account for their investments using SS&C's products and services.
   

  

**Job Description**
 SS&C Advent
   

  

 SS&C Advent is an independent business unit of SS&C Technologies and a leading provider of award-winning software and services for the investment management industry worldwide. Our 4000+ clients across 50+ countries include asset managers, wealth managers, banks, family offices, fund managers, fund administrators and prime brokers. Our solutions streamline their processes for portfolio management, trading and order management, compliance, portfolio accounting, performance analytics, reporting and more.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a talented and motivated person to join our team at SS&C Advent as a Software Engineering Consultant.
   

  

 In this role, you will help our clients across Europe, Middle East, Africa and Asia Pacific optimize business workflows, by creating, delivering and supporting any customizations they need to bridge our technology with their unique requirements. You will collaborate closely with the client to gather requirements and provide detailed specifications, to ensure delivery meets their expectations. This work includes consulting, analysis, development and quality assurance.
   

  

 SS&C Advent provides training, covering the securities industry, database and networking technologies as well as our portfolio management and reporting products, including tools used for creating customizations. Once settled in you will work closely with our clients and the entire team at SS&C Advent, across business functions and regions. The work is rewarding, yet presents new challenges every day. It requires fast pace and ability to adapt to challenges and priorities as needed.
   

  

 This is a unique opportunity to blend financial industry knowledge with technology skills, in a vibrant, international work environment. You get to tap into the knowledge of leading financial institutions as well as our experienced team, to learn and develop skills that will ultimately help you progress your career, and grow a solid network within the fin-tech industry.
   

  

 The work will be out of our Stockholm office, with the possibility to work from home a few days a week.
   

  

 Your Responsibilities
   

  

* Provide custom engineering services for clients across EMEA and APAC regions, covering modification and development of software specified by the services organization.
* Assist SS&C Advent’s services organization by sharing knowledge of software development skill sets and providing consultancy.
* Create technical documentation for custom engineering items.
* Support items already developed and delivered.
* Train and learn on product changes and new technologies relevant to building custom engineering items.
* Manage and utilize outsourcing resources.
* Manage custom solution project deliverables in implementation projects.


 Your experience
   

  

* 3+ years of relevant working experience in C# developing.
* Experience with Microsoft SQL server (T-SQL, ADO .NET, database tools, etc).
* Experience with SQL Server Reporting Services is a plus.
* Fluent in one of the Scandinavian language.
* Experience in the fintech industry is a plus.


 Our Culture
   

  

 At SS&C Advent, you will find a rewarding career where you can thrive at every level. We are proud of our unique business culture, founded on the passion of our people, dedicated to the success of our clients. As a company, we reward innovation and professionalism, and support personal development. We invest in our employees through offering competitive compensation and benefits, comprehensive training opportunities, and employee programs to promote a healthy work-life balance and personal well-being.
   

  

 Our culture thrives on teamwork and diversity. Therefore, we hope to see you bring your unique perspective and talent to SS&C Advent, and thrive!
   

  

 Unless explicitly requested or approached by SS&C Technologies, Inc. or any of its affiliated companies, the company will not accept unsolicited resumes from headhunters, recruitment agencies, or fee-based recruitment services.
   

  

 SS&C offers excellent benefits including health, tuition and professional development reimbursement plan. SS&C Technologies is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer and does not discriminate against any applicant for employment or employee on the basis of race, color, religious creed, gender, age, marital status, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, veteran status or any other classification protected by applicable discrimination laws.
   

  

**EEO Statement / Non-agency Disclosure**
 We encourage applications from people of all backgrounds and particularly welcome applications from under-represented groups, to enable us to bring a diversity of perspectives to our thinking and conversation. It's important to us that we strive to have a workforce that is diverse in the widest sense.
   

  

 Unless explicitly requested or approached by SS&C Technologies, Inc. or any of its affiliated companies, the company will not accept unsolicited resumes from headhunters, recruitment agencies, or fee-based recruitment services.
   

  

 Unless explicitly requested or approached by SS&C Technologies, Inc. or any of its affiliated companies, the company will not accept unsolicited resumes from headhunters, recruitment agencies, or fee-based recruitment services. SS&C offers excellent benefits including health, dental, 401k plan, tuition and professional development reimbursement plan. SS&C Technologies is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer and does not discriminate against any applicant for employment or employee on the basis of race, color, religious creed, gender, age, marital status, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, veteran status or any other classification protected by applicable discrimination laws.

title: Senior Windowstekniker
description:
**Arbetsbeskrivning**
 Vi söker en senior Windowstekniker med säkerhet som specialist område, till vår kund utanför Uppsala eller i Solna. Denna kompetens är nödvändig för deras organisation då nya kunder förväntas införas till plattformen inom kort och därmed ökas. Vi söker en resurs på 100 % och detta är ett konsultuppdrag hos oss på Randstad Digital, där möjlighet till anställning hos kunden finns på sikt. Till dess kommer du vara en del av Randstad Digital och där du kommer ha en konsultchef som engagerar sig i ditt uppdrag och din utveckling.
   

  

 Detta konsultuppdrag är säkerhetsklassat så du kommer behöva genomgå en säkerhetsklassning samt vara svensk medborgare.
   

  

**Company Description**
 Randstad Digital är en del av Randstad, världens största HR-tjänsteföretag. Randstad Digital finns idag etablerat i 20 länder runt om i världen. Vi stöttar kunder i deras digitalisering, genom att stötta dem med kompetens inom tech/IT, där vi kan erbjuda rekryteringslösningar, konsultlösningar samt helhetslösningar och projekt via våra globala leveransteam. Nu står vi inför en spännande tillväxtresa i Sverige!
   

  

 läs mer om oss här: https://www.randstaddigital.com/about/
   

  

**Ansvarsområde**
 Vi har idag dessa tjänster som vi behöver underhålla i den röda plattformen för säkerhetskänslig verksamhet (RISE).
   

  

 Windows Server Update Service RISE
   

  

 Windows volume activation service RISE
   

  

 RISE miljön med dess restriktioner och lagkrav har en ny nivå av administration som krävs för att säkerställa efterföljande av lagkrav. Därav är det viktigt med en person som är duktig på dokumentation och har högt säkerhetstänk.
   

  

**Kvalifikationer**
 Vi är av behov av en senior konsult med erfaren Windows kompetens. Plattformen (RISE) består av flertalet olika system och majoriteten av dessa använder Windows som operativsystem. RISE miljön med dess restriktioner och lagkrav har en ny nivå av administration som krävs för att säkerställa efterföljande av lagkrav. Därav är det viktigt med en person som är duktig på dokumentation och har högt säkerhetstänk.
   

  

**Vi Söker Någon Som**
 Har gedigen Windows kompetens.
   

  

 Har arbetat i stora miljöer med både med drift och utveckling av IT-infrastruktur.
   

  

 Trivs i förändring och har en naturlig strävan mot ständiga förbättringar.
   

  

 Har god samarbetsförmåga, och ett ödmjukt förhållningssätt till människor omkring sig.
   

  

 Trivs att samarbeta med andra och har även god struktur i sitt egna arbete.

title: Onboarding Manager
description:
SS&C is a global provider of investment and financial services and software for the financial services and healthcare industries. Named to Fortune 1000 list as top U.S. company based on revenue, SS&C is headquartered in Windsor, Connecticut and has 20,000+ employees in over 90 offices in 35 countries. Some 18,000 financial services and healthcare organizations, from the world's largest institutions to local firms, manage and account for their investments using SS&C's products and services.
   

  

**Job Description**
 SS&C Advent: Onboarding Manager, in Advent Outsourcing Services
   

  

**Company Overview**
 SS&C Technologies, Inc. provides the global financial services industry with a broad range of highly specialized software, software-enabled services and software as a service (SaaS) solutions for operational excellence. We deliver mission-critical processing for information management, analysis, trading, accounting, reporting and compliance.
   

  

 SS&C was founded in 1986 by William C. Stone and publicly listed on the NASDAQ (SSNC). Our head office is located in Windsor, Connecticut with offices throughout North America, Europe, Asia Pacific and Australia.
   

  

 Through a combination of organic innovation and strategic acquisitions, we have assembled a comprehensive selection of technology and service capabilities, backed by industry-leading expertise.
   

  

 Department Overview
   

  

 SS&C Advent Outsourcing Services (AOS) is responsible for providing outsourced services around our core software solutions. The group services a variety of clients with complex investment portfolios covering equities, bonds, repos, FX, exchange-traded derivatives and extensive OTC derivative books. The activities done include daily processing and management of clients back and middle office lifecycle including trade execution including trade capture, data enrichment, confirmations, trade export, reconciliations, valuations, payments and settlement, collateral management, client reporting, regulatory reporting, dealing with third parties (custodians, independent investment managers, market and performance, utilities, fund accountants, data providers, trade repositories, ARMs etc..), client-specific accounting, IT Deployment and Management and sometimes a wide range bespoke services to help our clients be successful when using any Advent Service.
   

  

 Clients are located across Europe, the Middle East and APAC and are often global in their investment servicing needs. Usually, clients purchase our software to fit their needs and in most cases address particularly bespoke and challenging workflows, as such they need a team comprises of a highly professional and experienced group with real-world expertise in the Advent core solutions. The services provided are done so using sophisticated software.
   

  

 Position Overview
   

  

 This is a position for an Onboarding Manager for the AOS team. The person needs to be experienced, capable, knowledgeable about the software & Services implementation process, and able to work well with clients and team members in the office as well as external locations to ensure successful client delivery and help drive client experience. Experience should include services operations with ideally an experience of managing projects and resources in a client delivery type role. The role will be within our core Outsourcing team overseeing our new and existing clients onboarding on to the Services that Advent provides its clients. The individual needs to be self-motivated and can create, drive and enhance the process of delivery whilst reporting to senior management with area’s of improvement and how those improvements can be accomplished.
   

  

 The position will take responsibility for
   

  

* Ensuring service quality provided to the clients onboarding experience.
* Overseeing the entire onboarding process working with key resources within the different services team to ensure a smooth delivery
* Help to create and maintain the complete onboarding process with a standard documentation and approach methodology.
* Be able to communicate clearly to our clients and help to ensure that the correct expectations are being set throughout the entire onboarding life cycle.
* Ensuring all processing and other services provided to the client are kept at a high standard.
* Supporting daily operations of our Operational Services team and working closely with other Operations team members.
* Earning and maintaining good working relationships with clients.
* Building and maintaining good relationships with the team at different locations and collaborating with them to enhance and build on the services we deliver to our clients.
* Track client satisfaction on all engagements and report on trends and enhancements to help improve service delivery to senior management.
* Being the main client contact thought out the onboarding life cycle.
* Working with the rest of Advent, to help support our clients and prospective clients.
* Provide support to the local Sales and Relationship Management team when they are positioning an AOS offering with clients & prospects.


 Therefore, the candidate will need experience in managing day to day engagements for a financial institution and be able to work with various teams to lead to success.
